channel.title: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content on My New Hugo Site

item.description: Web responsive design Referenced by CodeCademy Intro Responsive design refers to the ability of a website to resize and reorganize > its content based on: The size of other content on the website The size of the screen the website is being viewed on Notes from codecademy em represents the size of the base font being used. The default font size in a browser is 16 pixels.
